Package library_management_system

Class Library

java.lang.Object
library_management_system.Library
public class Library extends Object
Represents a library that manages a collection of books and users. Provides methods to add, remove, and search for books, as well as to manage user borrowing.
Since:
1.0

    • getAvailableBooks

      public List<Book> getAvailableBooks()
      Gets a list of available books in the library (books that have not been issued).
      Returns:
      A list of available books.

    • searchBook

      public List<Book> searchBook(String title)
      Searches for books by title in the library collection.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of books with matching titles.

    • displayUsers

      public void displayUsers()
      Displays all users and the books they have borrowed.

      public void displayBooks()
